meanings.definition: A device used for measuring the altitude and azimuth of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use altazimuths to track the movement of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The observatory is equipped with altazimuths to study the positions of planets.
meanings.sent3: During the stargazing event, the altazimuths decided to take a break and point at the moon instead.
meanings.sent4: The altazimuths stood tall like vigilant guardians, watching over the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming altazimuths resembled futuristic telescopes, ready to unveil cosmic mysteries.

meanings.definition: The plural form of altazimuth, referring to multiple devices used for measuring the altitude and azimuth of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: A group of altazimuths lined the rooftop, each focused on a different star.
meanings.sent2: The astronomers relied on altazimuths to accurately determine the positions of the constellations.
meanings.sent3: The altazimuths at the observatory had a race to see who could spot Jupiter first.
meanings.sent4: In the hands of skilled astronomers, altazimuths became like magical compasses guiding them through the cosmos.
meanings.sent5: The array of altazimuths resembled a chorus of instruments, harmonizing with the melodies of the night sky.
